overview.title: Technical Communicator
overview.subtitle: UX/Technical Writer | Technical Editor | Content Strategist | User-Advocate
overview.statement: Master of the best practices in technical communication with experience in structured authoring and the latest documentation technologies, I advocate for smart content that is reusable, searchable, and most of all, user-focused.
overview.goal: My career goal is to continue to benefit business goals by delivering fast, professional content and by advising on content goals, usablity practices, and by providing new creative soultions now made possible by web services and cloud computing.

degree.subject: Technical Communication
degree.summary: Established with user-centered approaches in technical communication, the coursework is a practicum on technical writing using the latest enterprise technologies.

degree.subject: English and a Minor in Writing
degree.summary: The coursework is built on an intense study of rhetoric and professional writing and communication.

position.title: Sr. Technical Writer
position.summary: Learned new technologies and workflows, continued to meet deadlines, and built consensus among the team and collaborators.
position.accomplishment: Led in merging the Renesas documentation team with the IDT technical writers.

items.item: Learned and utilized ExtendScript, An Adobe-based Javascript framework to automate FrameMaker tasks.
Took administrative control of Workfront, an Adobe platform for enterprise manangement.
Learned to use Workfront to track and measure the documentation workflow.
Used the Oracle system Agile to process the document lifecycle.

position.title: Assistant Manager, Technical Publications
position.summary: Working with a global team, I analyzed workflows, tracked metrics, diagnosed content management, and led the synthesization of the publishing workflow.
position.accomplishment: Transitioned Intersil documentation team to merge with Renesas documentation practices.

items.item: Met with Tokyo team in San Jose to integrage template branding and seek opportunities for synthesis in workflow and content management.
Created web portal for the documentation team to host procedures, guidelines, and templates.
Hosted training documentation tools and guidelines with subject matter experts.
Led team in adopting branding guidelines, style, and technical writing principles in delieverables.
Built strong relationships with new team members through merger.

position.title: Technical Editor
position.summary: Collaborated with technical writers, the marketing team, and subject matter experts to edit and publish both documentation and web content for high-profile product launches.
position.accomplishment: Learned quickly how to best edit highly technical content and then trained others.

items.item: Used management system tools to track, analyze, and improve the documentation workflow
Built a database to survey and analyze the Intersil corpus of technical documentation
Utilized text analysis applications to survey the writing of over 4,000 documents.
Scripted a parser to convert technical data into DITA topics.
Built rapport with the team and led te meet deadlines during a corporate merger.

skills.summary: In pushing to create clear, simple digital content for customers and end-users, my skillset and tools reflect my experience, education, and curiosity in the latest technologies.

softskills.skill: Relentless advocate for customers and users
Collaborator with team and global divisions
Reaches across teams to solve problems
Works to develop creative technical solutions
